body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Jerry Davis. May I have the pleasure of knowing your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Denise Murphy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Denise. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling frustrated because the inventory on your website doesn't match what's available at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Denise. To better assist you, could you provide me with your email address and phone number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is denisemurphy@gmail.com and my phone number is five five five, eight eight two, one one two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Denise. We will look into the inventory discrepancy and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Jerry. I hope this issue gets resolved quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your understanding, Denise. We will do our best to address the situation promptly. Have a great day!
